title: Morningstars
content:
: Direct an ally to strike a foe. The ally uses a reaction on their next turn to make a weapon attack.

Tenacity: When you miss an attack, deal (STR Mod) Bludgeoning damage anyway.

Twist of Fortune

Weapon Enchantment +1

Twist of Fortune: When you roll 2 or less with this weapon's damage die, reroll it and take the new result.Blood Money: Strike out greedily, dealing additional per 300 gold that the target possesses.
